item.description:
Hi,
Setting this event up for Tammy. Details are below. Please email her directly (by finding her in the members list) if you have any questions.

Home Spa party from 3-6

A list of services are:
hand massage
footbath
Artistry product demonstrations
fun games
and parafin bath

Dinner afterwards at Margaritas (http://www.margs.com/...) on Moody Street in Waltham.
Tammy will make reservations for dinner the night before the event.

This is a girls only event - get pampered then go out for drinks and dinner (your significant others can join in for dinner&drinks too!)

Tammy says
"I will also have snacks and drink for people. Ladies should bring their purses so they will be able to participate in one of the games. this is a relaxing and rejuvenating event for ladies who want to have a fun ladies day in and couples night out"
item.name: Home Spa Party at Tammy's #2 - Girls Only!
